name: Altium Designer Multi-board Project
summary: A PRJMBD file is a multi-board project created by Altium Designer, a CAD application used by engineers to design PCBs. It contains multiple Printed Circuit Board ( PCB ) design documents and includes layouts of PCB electrical components. PRJMBD files also store project settings and sub-project links for creating a product with multiple interconnected PCBs

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
